items.name: Goku
items.description: The protagonist of the series, known for his great power and friendly personality. Originally sent to Earth as a flying infant with the mission of conquering it. However, falling off a cliff dealt him a brutal blow that almost killed him, but it altered his memory and erased all the violent instincts of his species, causing him to grow up with a pure and kind heart, while still retaining all the powers of his race. In the new Dragon Ball continuity, it is established that he was sent by his parents to Earth to survive the destruction of their planet by Frieza at all costs. Later, Kakarot, now known as Son Goku, would become the prince consort of Mount Fry-pan and leader of the Z Fighters, as well as the greatest defender of Earth and Universe 7, managing to keep them safe from destruction on numerous occasions, despite not considering himself a hero or savior.

items.name: Vegeta
items.description: Prince of the Saiyans, initially a villain, but later joins the Z Fighters. Although at the beginning of Dragon Ball Z, Vegeta plays an antagonistic role, soon after he decides to rebel against Freeza's Empire, becoming a key ally for the Z Fighters. With the passage of time he would come to change his way of being, opting to remain and live on Earth to fight by his side against the impending adversities to overcome. Along with Piccolo, he is one of Goku's former enemies who has evolved from being a villain and anti-hero to eventually a hero over the course of the story, thus becoming the deuteragonist of the series.

items.name: Piccolo
items.description: He is a Namekian who emerged after being created in the last moments of his father's life, being his current reincarnation. Although in the beginning he was Son Goku's archenemy, as time went by he became less evil until he finally became a kind being and member of the Z Warriors. Over time, he also began to grow fond of his disciple Son Gohan, whom he saw as a kind of “offspring” and formed a bond of friendship with him.

items.name: Bulma
items.description: Bulma is the female protagonist of the manga series Dragon Ball and its anime adaptations Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Super and Dragon Ball GT. She is the daughter of Dr. Brief and his wife Panchy, younger sister of Tights and a great friend of Son Goku with whom she begins the search for the Dragon Spheres. In Dragon Ball Z she had Trunks, first-born son of her future husband Vegeta, her daughter Bra and her adult son Trunks from the alternate time Trunks from the Alternate Future.

items.name: Freezer
items.description: Freezer, also known as Frieza, is the space tyrant and the main antagonist of the Freezer saga.

items.name: Zarbon
items.description: Zarbon is one of Freezer's henchmen and a powerful fighter.

items.name: Dodoria
items.description: Dodoria is another henchman of Freezer known for his brutality.

items.name: Ginyu
items.description: Ginyu is the leader of the Freeza Army's most prestigious mercenary elite, which is named Ginew Special Forces in his honor.

items.name: Celula
items.description: Cell is a bioandroid created by Dr. Gero's computer, who came from the future of line 3 with the intention of taking revenge on Goku for having finished with the Red Ribbon Army, and with it the dream of every villain: to dominate the world. He is the main antagonist of the Android Arc and Cell.

items.name: Gohan
items.description: Son Gohan is one of the main characters of the Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball Super and Dragon Ball GT story arcs. He is a half-breed between Saiyan and Earth human. He is the first son of Son Goku and Chi-Chi, older brother of Son Goten, husband of Videl and father of Pan.

items.name: Krillin
items.description: A close friend of Goku and a brave warrior, he is a character in the Dragon Ball manga and anime. He is one of the main disciples of Kame-Sen'nin, Warrior Z, and Son Goku's best friend. He is, along with Bulma, one of the main supporting characters in Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z and Dragon Ball Super. He appears in Dragon Ball GT as a supporting character. In Majin Boo's Arc, he retires from martial arts, opting to start a family, as the husband of Android Number 18 and the father of Marron.

items.name: Tenshinhan
items.description: Martial arts master and member of the Z Fighters. He is a character that appears in the manga and anime of Dragon Ball, Dragon Ball Z, Dragon Ball GT and later in Dragon Ball Super.

items.name: Yamcha
items.description: Wrestler who used to be a desert bandit.

items.name: Chi-Chi
items.description: Goku's wife and Gohan's mother. She is the princess of Mount Fry-pan being the daughter of the late queen of this mountain and King Gyuma, she would end up meeting Son Goku when she was just a child to years later during her adolescence to be his wife and become the strict but loving mother of Gohan and Goten.

items.name: Gotenks
items.description: Gotenks is the result of the Fusion Dance performed correctly by Goten and Trunks.

items.name: Trunks
items.description: Son of Vegeta and Bulma. He is a half-breed between Earth human and Saiyan born on Earth, and son of Bulma and Vegeta, who is introduced to the Android Arc and Cell. Later in his life as a young man, he ends up becoming a martial arts fighter, Son Goten's best friend and his sister Bra's older brother.

items.name: Master Roshi
items.description: Martial arts master and Goku's mentor. Known by the name of Muten Rosh, he was once the strongest Earthling on Earth, and many people remember him as the “God of Martial Arts”, but before he could hold that title he had to work and study martial arts with his master Mutaito and his eternal rival Tsuru-Sen'nin.

items.name: Bardock
items.description: He is a lower-class Saiyan from Planet Vegeta in Universe 7. He belongs to the Saiyan Army, which is under the leadership of King Vegeta, and is the leader of his squadron during the annexation of the planet by the colonial forces of the Empire of Freeza. He is the husband of Gine and biological father of Kakarotto and Raditz.

items.name: Launch
items.description: Character who suffers personality changes when sneezing. She is one of the main characters of the manga Dragon Ball and its namesake anime; Lunch is a girl who suffers from a dual personality disorder that as a result of her allergic reactions causes her to switch between two different personalities, neither of the personalities remembering what the other did or said.

items.name: Mr. Satan
items.description: Human wrestler famous for taking credit for Z-Warrior victories.

items.name: Dende
items.description: Piccolo's successor as the new Namekian protector of Earth. He is a small Namekian, who lived in the village of Moori, along with his brother Scargo and many others of his kind. He is the 108th son of the Great Patriarch and later God of Earth, replacing God.

items.name: Android 17
items.description: Before being kidnapped, he is the twin brother of Android Number 18, who like her before being an Android was a normal human until they were kidnapped by Dr. Gero, and that is why they hate him. After his change from human to Android, he was inserted a chip with the aim of destroying Son Goku, who in his youth exterminated the Red Ribbon Army. Considering himself defective because he did not want to be 'slave of anyone', Dr. Gero had placed a shutdown device on both brothers to stop them at any moment of disobedience, but when the scientist awakens them, the resentment and rebelliousness of 17 was such that he was in charge of destroying the control that would lock him up again and then mercilessly killed his own creator. His situation would go against him, since Cell's mission was to absorb 17 and 18 to complete his development and become Cell Perfect.

items.name: Android 16
items.description: Android 16 is a giant android known for its love of nature and life.

items.name: Android 19
items.description: Android 19 is one of the androids created by Dr. Gero.

items.name: Android 20 (Dr. Gero)
items.description: Dr. Gero is the mad scientist who created androids 17, 18 and 19.

items.name: Android 13
items.description: Android 13 is a dangerous android that appears in the movie “The Return of Cooler”.

items.name: Android 14
items.description: Android 14 is another Android that appears in the same movie as Android 13.

items.name: Android 15
items.description: Android 15 is another Android that appears in the same movie as Android 13.

items.name: Nail
items.description: He is a Namekian (inhabitant of the planet Namek), who is characterized by being one of the few members of the “warrior lineage”, and being the most powerful among them along with Piccolo.

items.name: Raditz
items.description: He is the son of Bardock and Gine, and older brother of Son Goku. He is one of the few Saiyans who survived the destruction of Planet Vegeta, and was part of Vegeta's team. He is the first antagonist of Dragon Ball Z.

items.name: Babidi
items.description: Also known as Bóbidi or Bábidi, he is a powerful madoshi sorcerer, son of the great magician Bibbidi, founder of the Majin family. The “M” they both wear on the belt of their attire as well as the forehead of those who have been possessed to be part of the Majin family.

items.name: Majin Buu
items.description: Also known as original Boo, he is the original, pure form of Majin-Boo, and the last form of Boo to appear in Dragon Ball Z.

items.name: Bills
items.description: God of Destruction Beerus, is a character who was introduced in the movie Dragon Ball Z: Battle of the Gods, where he is the main antagonist of the film, and who appears in the manga and anime Dragon Ball Super as a main character. He occupies the position of God of Destruction of the entire Universe 7 being the place where the story of Dragon Ball takes place.

items.name: Whis
items.description: Whis is one of the sons of the High Priest, younger brother of Vados, Korn and Kus. He is the angel guide in charge of assisting and serving as a teacher to the God of Destruction of Universe 7, Beerus.

items.name: Zeno
items.description: Zeno is the supreme being of the multiverse and has overwhelming power .The King of Everything and nicknamed by Son Goku as Todito (全ぜんちゃん, Zen-chan), he is the absolute ruler and god of all universes and the ultimate ruler of all that exists in Dragon Ball.

items.name: Kibito-Shin
items.description: It is the fusion between Shin and Kibito. They were permanently united through the use of the mythical Pothala earrings. He is currently separated thanks to a wish granted by the Namekian Dragon Spheres.

items.name: Jiren
items.description: Jiren is a powerful fighter from Universe 11 and one of the most formidable opponents in the tournament.

items.name: Toppo
items.description: Toppo is the leader of the Pride Troops, warriors of justice from Universe 11 who act as protectors of peace and superheroes of good. He has been trained by the guiding angel Marcarita, thus becoming a candidate as a future God of Destruction in his universe.

items.name: Dyspo
items.description: Dyspo is one of the members of Team Universe 11 as one of the most powerful soldiers of the Pride Troops along with Jiren and their leader Toppo.

items.name: Marcarita
items.description: Marcarita is the guiding angel of Universe 11, servant and martial arts master of the God of Destruction Vermoud. She is a character from the Universal Survival Arc of Dragon Ball Super.

items.name: Vermoudh
items.description: He is the individual who currently holds the position of God of Destruction in Universe 11, a position he obtained after leaving his membership as a Pride Soldier within the Pride Troops.

items.name: Grand Priest
items.description: The High Priest is the overseer of the tournament and one of the most powerful beings. Grand Minister of the Omni-Kings , he is an angel who acts as a close advisor and guiding figure to Zenos and Future Zenos . From time to time he enforces the Divine Decrees of the Zenos and welcomes guests to his palace . The Great Minister is also the father of thirteen Angels, of whom twelve serve the Gods of Destruction . By his position and power, he is perhaps the second strongest being in the Multiverse.

items.name: Northern Kaio
items.description: This is the god in charge of administering the Northern Galaxies, the boreal quadrant of Universe 7 and supervising the gods of the planets in this sector (as is the case of Kami on Earth).

items.name: Android 18
items.description: She is the twin sister of Android Number 17 and an “android” created from a human base by Dr. Gero for the sole purpose of destroying Goku.

items.name: Gogeta
items.description: Gogeta is the resulting fusion of Son Goku and Vegeta, when they perform the Fusion Dance correctly to face Broly. His voice is a dual voice containing the voices of Goku and Vegeta. Together with the almighty power of the two, with Vegeta's cunning and insight, and Goku's prodigal martial arts skill, he is one of the most fearsome warriors to challenge to a fight.

items.name: Vegetto
items.description: Vegetto is the strongest character in the original manga and one of the most powerful characters in the series in general. His power is the result of the maximum combined power of Goku and Vegeta, multiplied several times his strength, being one of the most powerful fusions within the franchise.

items.name: Janemba
items.description: Janemba is a demon of pure evil and great malignant power. Created from the actions of a teenage ogre named Psyche Oni, who was responsible for guarding the soul purifying machine, which explodes as a result of the ogre's lack of care, the evil souls end up using his body as a host, thus creating this demon.

items.name: Broly
items.description: Broly is a Saiyajin who possesses gigantic and uncontrollable power, which manifests itself in all its magnitude when he becomes the Legendary Super Saiyajin. Even when he was just a baby, his level of power reached immense numbers that caused astonishment and concern among his race.

items.name: Southern Kaio
items.description: The Southern Kaio is the only reference we have to the other Kaiō gods in the manga, beyond the Northern Kaiō Sama as he is the only Kaiō, along with the Northern Kaiō, to appear in the manga, and one of the four to appear in the anime, along with the Great Kaio.

items.name: Eastern Kaio
items.description: The Eastern Kaiō is a Kaio that only appears in the anime. She likes challenges and to train her disciples hard, who stand out for being very fast warriors, the clearest example being Chapuchai.

items.name: Western Kaio
items.description: The Western Kaiō is the rival of the Kaio of the North. And as his name says, he controls the Western galaxy.

items.name: Great Kaio
items.description: Great Kaio is the most important Kaio of the Otherworld and is the God in charge of managing the other Kaiō to take care of whose sectors of the Galaxy. His appearance is that of an old man with a long and very gray beard, highlighted by dark glasses that he never takes off in the series. He has his own planet, the Planet of the Great Kaio, on which gravity is 10 times greater than that of planet Earth.

items.name: Eastern Kaio-shin
items.description: He is one of the Kaio-shin, the gods of creation who are in charge of creating life throughout Universe 7 and protecting it from supreme threats. He used to be in charge of protecting the eastern part of the universe, since after the death of the other Kaio-shin at the hands of Majin-Boo, he became the main Kaio-shin of Universe 7.

items.name: Northern Kaio-shin
items.description: The Northern Kaiō-shin is another of the Kaiō-shin who lived alongside the rest of the Kaio-shin and Dai Kaio-shin 5 million years ago, and who fought against Majin Boo.

items.name: Southern Kaio-shin
items.description: The Southern Kaio-shin was the ruler of the southern quadrant of the universe and was the most powerful among the Kaio-shin.

items.name: Western Kaio-shin
items.description: The Western Kaiō-shin is a Kaio-shin, who lived alongside her companions, she was the first to die in the terrible battle fought against Majin Boo 5 million years ago.

items.name: Great Kaio-shin
items.description: The Great Kaio-shin was the main Kaio-shin of Universe 7 and overseer of the other Kaio-shin of the same universe. After being absorbed by Majin Boo, the Great Kaio-shin of Universe 7 became the most dominant facet in Fat Boo, still currently living inside his body through his spirit.

items.name: Kibito
items.description: Kibito is the assistant and bodyguard of the East Kaio-shin. He is an expert fighter and has certain healing and magical powers as befits his role. His best known technique is the Kai-Kai.
